text: The 1990 Football Championship of the Belarusian SSR () was the 54th regular annual competition in football of the Byelorussian Soviet Socialist Republic at all-republican level. In the competition took part 48 teams in two tiers. ==Overview== It was contested by 16 teams, and Sputnik Minsk won the championship. ==Pershaja Liha== ===Teams=== ===Final standings=== ==Druhaja Liha== ===Subgroup 1 final standings=== ===Subgroup 2 final standings=== ==References== * RSSSF * history of the USSR championships among KFK (tables) (История первенств CCCР среди КФК (таблицы)). regional-football.ru Category:Football Championship of the Belarusian SSR Football Belarus
title: 1990 Football Championship of the Belarusian SSR
